pkgmetadata.longdescription: ## An example:``` pythonfrom rubip import rubipproxies = {'https': 'https://localhost:8080'}bot = rubip("Auth Account",proxies=proxies)gap = "guids"bot.sendMessage(gap,"pyrubika")```### How to import the Rubik's library``` bashfrom rubip import rubip```### How to install the library``` bashpip install rubip```### My ID in Rubika``` bash@mamadcoder1```## And My ID Channel in Rubika``` bash@python_java_source ```
